text:
@realDonaldTrump Liar.
Stop. Fukkcing.  Lying.

35 countries have tested a larger part of their population than us. 35!!

We have 4% of the worlds population, but 29% of #COVID19 deaths worldwide.  More than 100 000 Americans have perished. 

#TrumpOwnsEveryDeath 
#TrumpOwnsEveryBankruptcy
